projectGridLines.description:
Title: Regulatory requirement on Small molecules/Biologics/Vaccines & Medical devices

Description:

Skill sets: Regulatory Sciences

Traits expectation: Technical & Biopharmaceutical Knowledge with good communication skills, Program management

Expected learning: Strategy & Execution of Regulatory filings

Specific courses required for project execution: Knowledge on Global Biopharma Regulatory Affairs
